required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Impact of Immune Checkpoint Inhibitor Therapy on Type 2 Inflammation
clinical_study.official_title: Impact of Immune Checkpoint Inhibitor Therapy on Type 2 Inflammation

brief_summary.textblock: The primary objective of this study is to determine the impact of anti-checkpoint immunotherapy on type 2 inflammation via a retrospective analysis of % eosinophilia.

primary_outcome.measure: Change in % eosinophilia after initiation of anti-PD-1 and/or anti-PD-L1
primary_outcome.time_frame: Before treatment (before day 0) versus after (15 days)

primary_outcome.measure: Change in % eosinophilia after initiation of anti-PD-1 and/or anti-PD-L1
primary_outcome.time_frame: Before treatment (before day 0) versus after (1 month)

primary_outcome.measure: Change in % eosinophilia after initiation of anti-PD-1 and/or anti-PD-L1
primary_outcome.time_frame: Before treatment (before day 0) versus after (3 months)

primary_outcome.measure: Change in % eosinophilia after initiation of anti-PD-1 and/or anti-PD-L1
primary_outcome.time_frame: Before treatment (before day 0) versus after (6 months)

primary_outcome.measure: Change in % eosinophilia after initiation of anti-PD-1 and/or anti-PD-L1
primary_outcome.time_frame: Before treatment (before day 0) versus after (12 months)

secondary_outcome.measure: Indication leading to anti-PD-1 and/or anti-PD-L1 immunotherapies

clinical_study.condition: Patients Recieving Anti-PD-1 or Anti-PD-L1 Immunotherapies

arm_group.description: Patients in the University Hospitals of Montpellier system who have received anti-PD-1 and/or anti-PD-L1

intervention.description: Immunotherapy treatment via anti programmed death 1 and/or anti-programmed death ligand 1.

study_pop.textblock: The study population corresponds to all patients within the University Hospitals of Montpellier system who received anti-PDF-1 and/or anti-PD-L1 immunotherapies.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Electronic patient file "DxCare" at the University Hospitals of Montpellier
- Patient has received anti-PD-1 immunotherapy --AND/OR -- anti-PD-L1 immunotherapy according to central pharmacy records
Exclusion Criteria:
- No mention of % eosinophilia in the patient file
